source_caption_data.pre_caption: A wide shot from a tilted overhead angle shows a video game level that scrolls diagonally from the top right to the bottom left. The player's ship begins in the bottom left foreground and moves across the lower half of the frame, navigating a maze on the dark blue floor in the foreground and middle ground. A low, grey brick wall extends from the bottom left into the middle ground, while a taller, light blue wall occupies the background. Stationary elements, including green ground turrets and red barrels, are positioned in the middle ground. Flying enemy aircraft enter from the top right background and move diagonally toward the bottom left. A translucent blue energy barrier periodically appears vertically in the middle ground. The frame includes fixed overlays: a score at the top left, a vertical altitude meter on the left, and a heads-up display at the bottom.
